```diff
+ // é¡¹ç›®ç›¸å…³ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰

+   updateDate?: string

+   status: ProjectStatus
+   directoryPath?: string
+   directoryName?: string

+ 
+ export type ProjectStatus = 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­' | 'å·²å®Œæˆ' | 'æš‚åœ' | 'è®¡åˆ’ä¸­'
+ 
+ // API å“åº”ç±»å‹
+ export interface ApiResponse<T = any> {
+   success: boolean
+   data: T
+   message?: string
+   error?: string
```

```diff
- 
+ import { defineStore } from 'pinia'
+ import type { Project, SubProject, ProjectTag } from '@/types'
+ import { projectApi } from '@/services/api'
+ 
+ export const useProjectStore = defineStore('project', {
+   state: () => ({
+     projects: [] as Project[],
+     subProjects: {} as Record<string, SubProject[]>,
+     currentProject: null as Project | null,
+     currentTag: 'å…¨éƒ¨' as ProjectTag,
+     loading: false,
+     error: null as string | null
+   }),
+ 
+   getters: {
+     filteredProjects: (state) => {
+       if (state.currentTag === 'å…¨éƒ¨') {
+         return state.projects
+       }
+       return state.projects.filter(project => project.tag === state.currentTag)
+     },
+ 
+     currentSubProjects: (state) => {
+       if (!state.currentProject) return []
+       return state.subProjects[state.currentProject.id] || []
+     }
+   },
+ 
+   actions: {
+     async fetchProjects() {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         const response = await projectApi.getProjects()
+         this.projects = response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'è·å–é¡¹ç›®åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('è·å–é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     async createProject(projectData: Omit<Project, 'id' | 'createDate'>) {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         const response = await projectApi.createProject(projectData)
+         this.projects.push(response.data)
+         return response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+         throw error
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     async updateProject(id: string, projectData: Partial<Project>) {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         const response = await projectApi.updateProject(id, projectData)
+         const index = this.projects.findIndex(p => p.id === id)
+         if (index !== -1) {
+           this.projects[index] = response.data
+         }
+         if (this.currentProject?.id === id) {
+           this.currentProject = response.data
+         }
+         return response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+         throw error
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     async deleteProject(id: string) {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         await projectApi.deleteProject(id)
+         this.projects = this.projects.filter(p => p.id !== id)
+         if (this.currentProject?.id === id) {
+           this.currentProject = null
+         }
+         delete this.subProjects[id]
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+         throw error
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     async fetchSubProjects(parentId: string) {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         const response = await projectApi.getSubProjects(parentId)
+         this.subProjects[parentId] = response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'è·å–å­é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('è·å–å­é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     async createSubProject(subProjectData: Omit<SubProject, 'id' | 'createDate'>) {
+       this.loading = true
+       this.error = null
+       try {
+         const response = await projectApi.createSubProject(subProjectData)
+         const parentId = subProjectData.parentId
+         if (!this.subProjects[parentId]) {
+           this.subProjects[parentId] = []
+         }
+         this.subProjects[parentId].push(response.data)
+         return response.data
+       } catch (error) {
+         this.error = 'åˆ›å»ºå­é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥'
+         console.error('åˆ›å»ºå­é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+         throw error
+       } finally {
+         this.loading = false
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     setCurrentProject(project: Project | null) {
+       this.currentProject = project
+       if (project) {
+         this.fetchSubProjects(project.id)
+       }
+     },
+ 
+     setCurrentTag(tag: ProjectTag) {
+       this.currentTag = tag
+     },
+ 
+     clearError() {
+       this.error = null
+     }
+   }
+ }) 
```

```diff
+     showPathDialog: false,
+     selectedProjectId: null as string | null,
+     selectedSubProjectId: null as string | null,
+     resizing: false
+   }),

+   actions: {

+       this.sidebarWidth = Math.max(200, Math.min(600, width))
+     },
+ 
+     setHeaderHeight(height: number) {
+       this.headerHeight = Math.max(40, Math.min(120, height))
+     },
+ 
+     showPathSelector() {
+       this.showPathDialog = true
+     },
+ 
+     hidePathSelector() {
+       this.showPathDialog = false
+     },
+ 
+     setSelectedProject(id: string | null) {
+       this.selectedProjectId = id
+       this.selectedSubProjectId = null
+     },
+ 
+     setSelectedSubProject(id: string | null) {
+       this.selectedSubProjectId = id
+     },
+ 
+     setResizing(resizing: boolean) {
+       this.resizing = resizing
+     }
+   }
```

```diff
- 
+ import axios, { AxiosResponse } from 'axios'
+ import type { Project, SubProject, ApiResponse, PathValidationResult } from '@/types'
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºaxioså®ä¾‹
+ const api = axios.create({
+   baseURL: '/api',
+   timeout: 10000,
+   headers: {
+     'Content-Type': 'application/json'
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ // è¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ api.interceptors.request.use(
+   (config) => {
+     // å¯ä»¥åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ·»åŠ tokenç­‰è®¤è¯ä¿¡æ¯
+     return config
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ // å“åº”æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
+ api.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response: AxiosResponse<ApiResponse>) => {
+     return response.data
+   },
+   (error) => {
+     console.error('APIè¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     return Promise.reject(error)
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ // é¡¹ç›®ç›¸å…³API
+ export const projectApi = {
+   // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰é¡¹ç›®
+   getProjects(): Promise<ApiResponse<Project[]>> {
+     return api.get('/projects')
+   },
+ 
+   // åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®
+   createProject(projectData: Omit<Project, 'id' | 'createDate'>): Promise<ApiResponse<Project>> {
+     return api.post('/projects', projectData)
+   },
+ 
+   // æ›´æ–°é¡¹ç›®
+   updateProject(id: string, projectData: Partial<Project>): Promise<ApiResponse<Project>> {
+     return api.put(`/projects/${id}`, projectData)
+   },
+ 
+   // åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®
+   deleteProject(id: string): Promise<ApiResponse<void>> {
+     return api.delete(`/projects/${id}`)
+   },
+ 
+   // è·å–å­é¡¹ç›®
+   getSubProjects(parentId: string): Promise<ApiResponse<SubProject[]>> {
+     return api.get(`/projects/${parentId}/subprojects`)
+   },
+ 
+   // åˆ›å»ºå­é¡¹ç›®
+   createSubProject(subProjectData: Omit<SubProject, 'id' | 'createDate'>): Promise<ApiResponse<SubProject>> {
+     return api.post('/subprojects', subProjectData)
+   },
+ 
+   // éªŒè¯è·¯å¾„
+   validatePath(path: string): Promise<ApiResponse<PathValidationResult>> {
+     return api.post('/validate-path', { path })
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export default api 
```

```diff
+ const startResize = (e: MouseEvent) => {

+   uiStore.setResizing(true)

+   e.preventDefault()

+ const handleResize = (e: MouseEvent) => {

+   if (containerRect) {

+     uiStore.setSidebarWidth(newWidth)
+   }

+ const stopResize = () => {
+   isResizing = false
+   uiStore.setResizing(false)
+   document.removeEventListener('mousemove', handleResize)
+   document.removeEventListener('mouseup', stopResize)
+ }

+
```

```diff
+ <template>
+   <div class="project-cards">
+     <div
+       v-for="project in filteredProjects"
+       :key="project.id"
+       class="project-card card"
+       :class="{ 'card-selected': selectedProjectId === project.id }"
+       @click="handleCardClick(project)"
+       @dblclick="handleCardDoubleClick(project)"
+     >
+       <div class="card-header">
+         <h3>{{ project.name }}</h3>
+         <el-dropdown trigger="click" @command="handleMenuCommand">
+           <el-button :icon="MoreFilled" size="small" circle />
+           <template #dropdown>
+             <el-dropdown-menu>
+               <el-dropdown-item :command="{ action: 'edit', project }">
+                 ç¼–è¾‘
+               </el-dropdown-item>
+               <el-dropdown-item :command="{ action: 'openPath', project }">
+                 è®¾ç½®è·¯å¾„
+               </el-dropdown-item>
+               <el-dropdown-item :command="{ action: 'delete', project }" divided>
+                 åˆ é™¤
+               </el-dropdown-item>
+             </el-dropdown-menu>
+           </template>
+         </el-dropdown>
+       </div>
+       
+       <div class="card-content">
+         <p class="description">{{ project.description }}</p>
+         <div class="meta-info">
+           <span class="tag" :class="`tag-${getTagType(project.tag)}`">
+             {{ project.tag }}
+           </span>
+           <span class="date">{{ project.createDate }}</span>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+     
+     <!-- ç©ºçŠ¶æ€ -->
+     <div v-if="filteredProjects.length === 0" class="empty-state">
+       <el-empty description="æš‚æ— é¡¹ç›®" />
+     </div>
+   </div>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { computed } from 'vue'
+ import { MoreFilled } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus'
+ import { useProjectStore, useUIStore } from '@/stores'
+ import type { Project, ProjectTag } from '@/types'
+ 
+ const projectStore = useProjectStore()
+ const uiStore = useUIStore()
+ 
+ const filteredProjects = computed(() => projectStore.filteredProjects)
+ const selectedProjectId = computed(() => uiStore.selectedProjectId)
+ 
+ const handleCardClick = (project: Project) => {
+   uiStore.setSelectedProject(project.id)
+   projectStore.setCurrentProject(project)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleCardDoubleClick = (project: Project) => {
+   // åŒå‡»æ‰“å¼€é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢
+   const params = new URLSearchParams({
+     id: project.id,
+     title: project.title,
+     name: project.name,
+     path: project.directoryPath || '',
+     panel: 'basic',
+     mindmap_tab: 'project'
+   })
+   
+   const url = `file:///D:/AI-Projects/nodemind/jsmind-project.html?${params.toString()}`
+   window.open(url, '_blank')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleMenuCommand = async (command: { action: string, project: Project }) => {
+   const { action, project } = command
+   
+   switch (action) {
+     case 'edit':
+       // è§¦å‘ç¼–è¾‘å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+       break
+     case 'openPath':
+       uiStore.showPathSelector()
+       projectStore.setCurrentProject(project)
+       break
+     case 'delete':
+       try {
+         await ElMessageBox.confirm('ç¡®å®šåˆ é™¤æ­¤é¡¹ç›®å—ï¼Ÿ', 'è­¦å‘Š', {
+           confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+           cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+           type: 'warning'
+         })
+         await projectStore.deleteProject(project.id)
+         ElMessage.success('é¡¹ç›®åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ')
+       } catch (error) {
+         if (error !== 'cancel') {
+           ElMessage.error('åˆ é™¤é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥')
+         }
+       }
+       break
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const getTagType = (tag: ProjectTag) => {
+   const tagTypeMap = {
+     'å¼€å‘': 'primary',
+     'è®¾è®¡': 'danger',
+     'åˆ†æ': 'success',
+     'æ–‡æ¡£': 'warning',
+     'æµ‹è¯•': 'info',
+     'å…¨éƒ¨': 'default'
+   }
+   return tagTypeMap[tag] || 'default'
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped lang="scss">
+ .project-cards {
+   display: grid;
+   grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
+   gap: $spacing-lg;
+   margin-top: $spacing-xl;
+   
+   @media (max-width: $breakpoint-md) {
+     grid-template-columns: 1fr;
+     gap: $spacing-md;
+     margin-top: $spacing-lg;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .project-card {
+   padding: $spacing-lg;
+   cursor: pointer;
+   transition: all $transition-normal;
+   
+   &:hover {
+     transform: translateY(-2px);
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .card-header {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: space-between;
+   align-items: flex-start;
+   margin-bottom: $spacing-md;
+   
+   h3 {
+     font-size: $font-size-lg;
+     font-weight: 600;
+     color: $text-primary;
+     margin: 0;
+     flex: 1;
+     margin-right: $spacing-sm;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .card-content {
+   .description {
+     color: $text-secondary;
```

```diff
+ // é¡¹ç›®ç›¸å…³ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰
+ export interface Project {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   title: string
+   description: string
+   createDate: string
+   updateDate?: string
+   tag: ProjectTag
+   status: ProjectStatus
+   directoryPath?: string
+   directoryName?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export interface SubProject {
+   id: string
+   name: string
+   parentId: string
+   createDate: string
+   status: ProjectStatus
+   description: string
+   path?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export type ProjectTag = 'å…¨éƒ¨' | 'å¼€å‘' | 'è®¾è®¡' | 'åˆ†æ' | 'æ–‡æ¡£' | 'æµ‹è¯•'
+ 
+ export type ProjectStatus = 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­' | 'å·²å®Œæˆ' | 'æš‚åœ' | 'è®¡åˆ’ä¸­'
+ 
+ // API å“åº”ç±»å‹
+ export interface ApiResponse<T = any> {
+   success: boolean
+   data: T
+   message?: string
+   error?: string
+ }
+ 
+ // è·¯å¾„éªŒè¯ç»“æœ
+ export interface PathValidationResult {
+   valid: boolean
+   message: string
+   suggestion?: string
+ }
+ 
+ // æ•°æ®åº“æ¨¡å‹ç±»å‹
+ export interface ProjectModel extends Omit<Project, 'createDate' | 'updateDate'> {
+   created_at: string
+   updated_at?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export interface SubProjectModel extends Omit<SubProject, 'createDate'> {
+   created_at: string
+   parent_id: string
+ }
+ 
+ // APIè¯·æ±‚ç±»å‹
+ export interface CreateProjectRequest {
+   name: string
+   title: string
+   description: string
+   tag: ProjectTag
+   status?: ProjectStatus
+   directoryPath?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export interface UpdateProjectRequest {
+   name?: string
+   title?: string
+   description?: string
+   tag?: ProjectTag
+   status?: ProjectStatus
+   directoryPath?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export interface CreateSubProjectRequest {
+   name: string
+   parentId: string
+   description: string
+   status?: ProjectStatus
+   path?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export interface ValidatePathRequest {
+   path: string
+ }
```

```diff
- 
+ import express from 'express'
+ import cors from 'cors'
+ import helmet from 'helmet'
+ import path from 'path'
+ import { initDatabase } from './utils/database'
+ import projectRoutes from './routes/projectRoutes'
+ import { errorHandler } from './middleware/errorHandler'
+ import { logger } from './middleware/logger'
+ 
+ const app = express()
+ const PORT = process.env.PORT || 3001
+ 
+ // ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+ app.use(helmet())
+ app.use(cors({
+   origin: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' 
+     ? process.env.FRONTEND_URL 
+     : 'http://localhost:3000'
+ }))
+ app.use(express.json())
+ app.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true }))
+ app.use(logger)
+ 
+ // è·¯ç”±
+ app.use('/api/projects', projectRoutes)
+ app.use('/api/subprojects', projectRoutes)
+ app.use('/api/validate-path', projectRoutes)
+ 
+ // å¥åº·æ£€æŸ¥
+ app.get('/api/health', (req, res) => {
+   res.json({ 
+     status: 'ok', 
+     message: 'æ™ºèƒ½ä½“ç»¼åˆç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿåç«¯æœåŠ¡è¿è¡Œæ­£å¸¸',
+     timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ // 404å¤„ç†
+ app.use('*', (req, res) => {
+   res.status(404).json({
+     success: false,
+     message: 'APIæ¥å£ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ // é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+ app.use(errorHandler)
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®åº“å¹¶å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡å™¨
+ async function startServer() {
+   try {
+     await initDatabase()
+     console.log('âœ… æ•°æ®åº“åˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸ')
+     
+     app.listen(PORT, () => {
+       console.log(`ğŸš€ æœåŠ¡å™¨è¿è¡Œåœ¨ http://localhost:${PORT}`)
+       console.log(`ğŸ“Š å¥åº·æ£€æŸ¥: http://localhost:${PORT}/api/health`)
+       console.log(`ğŸ—ƒï¸ æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶: ${path.join(__dirname, '../database/projects.db')}`)
+     })
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('âŒ æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     process.exit(1)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¤„ç†æœªæ•è·çš„å¼‚å¸¸
+ process.on('uncaughtException', (error) => {
+   console.error('æœªæ•è·çš„å¼‚å¸¸:', error)
+   process.exit(1)
+ })
+ 
+ process.on('unhandledRejection', (reason, promise) => {
+   console.error('æœªå¤„ç†çš„Promiseæ‹’ç»:', reason)
+   process.exit(1)
+ })
+ 
+ // ä¼˜é›…å…³é—­
+ process.on('SIGTERM', () => {
+   console.log('æ”¶åˆ°SIGTERMä¿¡å·ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨å…³é—­æœåŠ¡å™¨...')
+   process.exit(0)
```

```diff
- 
+ import sqlite3 from 'sqlite3'
+ import { promisify } from 'util'
+ import path from 'path'
+ import fs from 'fs-extra'
+ 
+ // æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„
+ const DB_PATH = path.join(__dirname, '../../database/projects.db')
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
+ class Database {
+   private db: sqlite3.Database | null = null
+ 
+   async connect(): Promise<void> {
+     // ç¡®ä¿æ•°æ®åº“ç›®å½•å­˜åœ¨
+     await fs.ensureDir(path.dirname(DB_PATH))
+     
+     return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+       this.db = new sqlite3.Database(DB_PATH, (err) => {
+         if (err) {
+           reject(err)
+         } else {
+           resolve()
+         }
+       })
+     })
+   }
+ 
+   async run(sql: string, params?: any[]): Promise<{ lastID: number, changes: number }> {
+     if (!this.db) throw new Error('æ•°æ®åº“æœªè¿æ¥')
+     
+     return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+       this.db!.run(sql, params || [], function(err) {
+         if (err) {
+           reject(err)
+         } else {
+           resolve({ lastID: this.lastID, changes: this.changes })
+         }
+       })
+     })
+   }
+ 
+   async get<T = any>(sql: string, params?: any[]): Promise<T | undefined> {
+     if (!this.db) throw new Error('æ•°æ®åº“æœªè¿æ¥')
+     
+     return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+       this.db!.get(sql, params || [], (err, row) => {
+         if (err) {
+           reject(err)
+         } else {
+           resolve(row as T)
+         }
+       })
+     })
+   }
+ 
+   async all<T = any>(sql: string, params?: any[]): Promise<T[]> {
+     if (!this.db) throw new Error('æ•°æ®åº“æœªè¿æ¥')
+     
+     return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+       this.db!.all(sql, params || [], (err, rows) => {
+         if (err) {
+           reject(err)
+         } else {
+           resolve(rows as T[])
+         }
+       })
+     })
+   }
+ 
+   async close(): Promise<void> {
+     if (!this.db) return
+     
+     return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+       this.db!.close((err) => {
+         if (err) {
+           reject(err)
+         } else {
+           this.db = null
+           resolve()
+         }
+       })
+     })
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å•ä¾‹æ•°æ®åº“å®ä¾‹
+ const database = new Database()
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨
+ export async function initDatabase(): Promise<void> {
+   await database.connect()
+   
+   // åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®è¡¨
+   await database.run(`
+     CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS projects (
+       id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
+       name TEXT NOT NULL,
+       title TEXT NOT NULL,
+       description TEXT,
+       tag TEXT NOT NULL,
+       status TEXT DEFAULT 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­',
+       directory_path TEXT,
+       directory_name TEXT,
+       created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+       updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
+     )
+   `)
+ 
+   // åˆ›å»ºå­é¡¹ç›®è¡¨
+   await database.run(`
+     CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sub_projects (
+       id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
+       name TEXT NOT NULL,
+       parent_id TEXT NOT NULL,
+       description TEXT,
+       status TEXT DEFAULT 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­',
+       path TEXT,
+       created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
+       FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES projects (id) ON DELETE CASCADE
+     )
+   `)
+ 
+   // åˆ›å»ºç´¢å¼•
+   await database.run(`CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_projects_tag ON projects(tag)`)
+   await database.run(`CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_projects_status ON projects(status)`)
+   await database.run(`CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_sub_projects_parent ON sub_projects(parent_id)`)
+   
+   console.log('æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å®Œæˆ')
+ }
+ 
+ export { database } 
```

```diff
+ import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express'
+ 
+ export interface CustomError extends Error {
+   statusCode?: number
+   code?: string
+ }
+ 
+ export function errorHandler(
+   err: CustomError,
+   req: Request,
+   res: Response,
+   next: NextFunction
+ ): void {
+   console.error('é”™è¯¯è¯¦æƒ…:', {
+     message: err.message,
+     stack: err.stack,
+     url: req.url,
+     method: req.method,
+     body: req.body,
+     timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
+   })
+ 
+   // é»˜è®¤é”™è¯¯çŠ¶æ€ç 
+   let statusCode = err.statusCode || 500
+   let message = err.message || 'æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯'
+ 
+   // æ ¹æ®é”™è¯¯ç±»å‹è®¾ç½®å“åº”
+   if (err.code === 'ENOENT') {
+     statusCode = 404
+     message = 'æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–è·¯å¾„ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
+   } else if (err.code === 'EACCES') {
+     statusCode = 403
+     message = 'æƒé™ä¸è¶³ï¼Œæ— æ³•è®¿é—®è¯¥è·¯å¾„'
+   } else if (err.message.includes('UNIQUE constraint failed')) {
+     statusCode = 409
+     message = 'æ•°æ®å·²å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ— æ³•é‡å¤åˆ›å»º'
+   } else if (err.message.includes('FOREIGN KEY constraint failed')) {
+     statusCode = 400
+     message = 'å…³è”æ•°æ®ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
+   }
+ 
+   // ç”Ÿäº§ç¯å¢ƒä¸æš´éœ²è¯¦ç»†é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
+   if (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' && statusCode === 500) {
+     message = 'æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯'
+   }
+ 
+   res.status(statusCode).json({
+     success: false,
+     error: message,
+     ...(process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production' && { 
+       stack: err.stack,
+       details: err 
+     })
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ export class AppError extends Error {
+   public statusCode: number
+   public isOperational: boolean
+ 
+   constructor(message: string, statusCode: number = 500) {
+     super(message)
+     this.statusCode = statusCode
+     this.isOperational = true
+ 
+     Error.captureStackTrace(this, this.constructor)
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // å¸¸ç”¨é”™è¯¯åˆ›å»ºå‡½æ•°
+ export const createError = {
+   badRequest: (message: string = 'è¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯') => new AppError(message, 400),
+   unauthorized: (message: string = 'æœªæˆæƒè®¿é—®') => new AppError(message, 401),
+   forbidden: (message: string = 'è®¿é—®è¢«ç¦æ­¢') => new AppError(message, 403),
+   notFound: (message: string = 'èµ„æºä¸å­˜åœ¨') => new AppError(message, 404),
+   conflict: (message: string = 'æ•°æ®å†²çª') => new AppError(message, 409),
+   internal: (message: string = 'æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯') => new AppError(message, 500)
+ }
```

```diff
+ import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express'
+ 
+ export function logger(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction): void {
+   const timestamp = new Date().toISOString()
+   const method = req.method
+   const url = req.url
+   const userAgent = req.get('User-Agent') || 'Unknown'
+   const ip = req.ip || req.connection.remoteAddress || 'Unknown'
+ 
+   console.log(`[${timestamp}] ${method} ${url} - ${ip} - ${userAgent}`)
+   
+   // è®°å½•å“åº”æ—¶é—´
+   const startTime = Date.now()
+   
+   res.on('finish', () => {
+     const endTime = Date.now()
+     const duration = endTime - startTime
+     const statusCode = res.statusCode
+     
+     console.log(`[${timestamp}] ${method} ${url} - ${statusCode} - ${duration}ms`)
+   })
+   
+   next()
+ } 
```

```diff
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { computed } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage, ElMessageBox } from 'element-plus'
+ import { useProjectStore, useUIStore } from '@/stores'
+ import type { SubProject, ProjectStatus } from '@/types'
+ 
+ const projectStore = useProjectStore()
+ const uiStore = useUIStore()
+ 
+ const selectedSubProjectId = computed(() => uiStore.selectedSubProjectId)
+ 
+ const handleSubProjectClick = (subProject: SubProject) => {
+   uiStore.setSelectedSubProject(subProject.id)
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSubProjectDoubleClick = (subProject: SubProject) => {
+   // åŒå‡»æ‰“å¼€é¡¹ç›®ç®¡ç†é¡µé¢
+   const params = new URLSearchParams({
+     id: subProject.id,
+     title: subProject.name,
+     name: subProject.name,
+     path: subProject.path || '',
+     panel: 'basic',
+     mindmap_tab: 'project'
+   })
+   
+   const url = `file:///D:/AI-Projects/nodemind/jsmind-project.html?${params.toString()}`
+   window.open(url, '_blank')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleAddSubProject = async () => {
+   if (!projectStore.currentProject) {
+     ElMessage.warning('è¯·å…ˆé€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®ï¼')
+     return
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const subProjectName = await ElMessageBox.prompt('è¯·è¾“å…¥å­é¡¹ç›®åç§°ï¼š', 'æ·»åŠ å­é¡¹ç›®', {
+       confirmButtonText: 'ç¡®å®š',
+       cancelButtonText: 'å–æ¶ˆ',
+       inputPattern: /\S+/,
+       inputErrorMessage: 'å­é¡¹ç›®åç§°ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º'
+     })
+     
+     if (subProjectName.value && subProjectName.value.trim() !== '') {
+       await projectStore.createSubProject({
+         name: subProjectName.value.trim(),
+         parentId: projectStore.currentProject.id,
+         description: `è¿™æ˜¯å­é¡¹ç›® ${subProjectName.value.trim()} çš„æè¿°ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚`,
+         status: 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­'
+       })
+       
+       ElMessage.success('å­é¡¹ç›®åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ')
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     if (error !== 'cancel') {
+       ElMessage.error('åˆ›å»ºå­é¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥')
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const getStatusType = (status: ProjectStatus) => {
+   const statusTypeMap = {
+     'è¿›è¡Œä¸­': 'primary',
+     'å·²å®Œæˆ': 'success', 
+     'æš‚åœ': 'warning',
+     'è®¡åˆ’ä¸­': 'info'
+   }
+   return statusTypeMap[status] || 'default'
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped lang="scss">
```

```diff
+ <template>
+   <el-dialog
+     v-model="visible"
+     title="åˆ›å»ºæ–°é¡¹ç›®"
+     width="500px"
+     @close="handleClose"
+   >
+     <el-form
+       ref="formRef"
+       :model="formData"
+       :rules="formRules"
+       label-width="80px"
+     >
+       <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®åç§°" prop="name">
+         <el-input
+           v-model="formData.name"
+           placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®åç§°"
+           maxlength="50"
+           show-word-limit
+         />
+       </el-form-item>

+       <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®æ ‡é¢˜" prop="title">
+         <el-input
+           v-model="formData.title"
+           placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®æ ‡é¢˜"
+           maxlength="100"
+           show-word-limit
+         />
+       </el-form-item>
+       
+       <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾" prop="tag">
+         <el-select v-model="formData.tag" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾">
+           <el-option label="å¼€å‘" value="å¼€å‘" />
+           <el-option label="è®¾è®¡" value="è®¾è®¡" />
+           <el-option label="åˆ†æ" value="åˆ†æ" />
+           <el-option label="æ–‡æ¡£" value="æ–‡æ¡£" />
+           <el-option label="æµ‹è¯•" value="æµ‹è¯•" />
+         </el-select>
+       </el-form-item>
+       
+       <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®æè¿°" prop="description">
+         <el-input
+           v-model="formData.description"
+           type="textarea"
+           :rows="3"
+           placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®æè¿°"
+           maxlength="500"
+           show-word-limit
+         />
+       </el-form-item>
+       
+       <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®è·¯å¾„">
+         <el-input
+           v-model="formData.directoryPath"
+           placeholder="é€‰å¡«ï¼šé¡¹ç›®ç›®å½•è·¯å¾„"
+           maxlength="260"
+         >
+           <template #append>
+             <el-button @click="handleSelectPath">é€‰æ‹©</el-button>
+           </template>
+         </el-input>
+       </el-form-item>
+     </el-form>
+     
+     <template #footer>
+       <span class="dialog-footer">
+         <el-button @click="handleClose">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+         <el-button type="primary" @click="handleSubmit" :loading="loading">
+           åˆ›å»º
+         </el-button>
+       </span>
+     </template>
+   </el-dialog>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, reactive, computed } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage, ElForm } from 'element-plus'
+ import { useProjectStore } from '@/stores'
+ import type { ProjectFormData, ProjectTag } from '@/types'
+ 
+ interface Props {
+   modelValue: boolean
+ }
+ 
+ interface Emits {
+   (e: 'update:modelValue', value: boolean): void
+ }
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<Props>()
+ const emit = defineEmits<Emits>()
+ 
+ const projectStore = useProjectStore()
+ 
+ const formRef = ref<InstanceType<typeof ElForm>>()
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ 
+ const visible = computed({
+   get: () => props.modelValue,
+   set: (value) => emit('update:modelValue', value)
+ })
+ 
+ const formData = reactive<ProjectFormData>({
+   name: '',
+   title: '',
+   tag: 'å¼€å‘' as ProjectTag,
+   description: '',
+   directoryPath: ''
+ })
+ 
+ const formRules = {
+   name: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®åç§°', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 1, max: 50, message: 'é¡¹ç›®åç§°é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 1 åˆ° 50 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   title: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®æ ‡é¢˜', trigger: 'blur' },
+     { min: 1, max: 100, message: 'é¡¹ç›®æ ‡é¢˜é•¿åº¦åœ¨ 1 åˆ° 100 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ],
+   tag: [
+     { required: true, message: 'è¯·é€‰æ‹©é¡¹ç›®æ ‡ç­¾', trigger: 'change' }
+   ],
+   description: [
+     { max: 500, message: 'é¡¹ç›®æè¿°æœ€å¤š 500 ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦', trigger: 'blur' }
+   ]
+ }
+ 
+ const handleClose = () => {
+   visible.value = false
+   resetForm()
+ }
+ 
+ const resetForm = () => {
+   formData.name = ''
+   formData.title = ''
+   formData.tag = 'å¼€å‘'
+   formData.description = ''
+   formData.directoryPath = ''
+   formRef.value?.clearValidate()
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSelectPath = () => {
+   // TODO: å®ç°è·¯å¾„é€‰æ‹©åŠŸèƒ½
+   ElMessage.info('è·¯å¾„é€‰æ‹©åŠŸèƒ½å¼€å‘ä¸­...')
+ }
+ 
+ const handleSubmit = async () => {
+   if (!formRef.value) return
+   
+   try {
+     await formRef.value.validate()
+     loading.value = true
+     
+     await projectStore.createProject({
+       name: formData.name,
+       title: formData.title,
+       tag: formData.tag,
+       description: formData.description,
+       status: 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­',
+       directoryPath: formData.directoryPath || undefined
+     })
+     
+     ElMessage.success('é¡¹ç›®åˆ›å»ºæˆåŠŸ')
+     handleClose()
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     ElMessage.error('åˆ›å»ºé¡¹ç›®å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•')
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped lang="scss">
+ .dialog-footer {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: flex-end;
+   gap: $spacing-sm;
+ }
+ 
+ :deep(.el-form-item__label) {
+   font-weight: 500;
+ }
+ 
+ :deep(.el-textarea .el-input__count) {
+   background-color: transparent;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

---

```diff
- 
+ <template>
+   <el-dialog
+     v-model="visible"
+     title="è®¾ç½®é¡¹ç›®è·¯å¾„"
+     width="600px"
+     @close="handleClose"
+   >
+     <div class="path-selector">
+       <el-form>
+         <el-form-item label="é¡¹ç›®è·¯å¾„">
+           <el-input
+             v-model="pathInput"
+             placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®è·¯å¾„ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šD:\AI-Projects\my-project"
+             maxlength="260"
+             show-word-limit
+           />
+         </el-form-item>
+       </el-form>
+       
+       <div class="path-hint">
+         <el-alert
+           title="è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼æç¤º"
+           type="info"
+           :closable="false"
+           show-icon
+         >
+           <template #default>
+             <div class="hint-content">
+               <p>ğŸ“ æ”¯æŒè·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼ï¼šWindows (D:\folder\project) æˆ– Unix (/home/user/project)</p>
+               <p>âœ… ç³»ç»Ÿä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼å¹¶æä¾›ä¿®æ­£å»ºè®®</p>
+               <p>âš ï¸ è·¯å¾„ä¸­ä¸èƒ½åŒ…å«ä»¥ä¸‹å­—ç¬¦ï¼š&lt; &gt; " | ? *</p>
+             </div>
+           </template>
+         </el-alert>
+       </div>
+       
+       <div v-if="validationResult" class="validation-result">
+         <el-alert
+           :title="validationResult.message"
+           :type="validationResult.valid ? 'success' : 'warning'"
+           :closable="false"
+           show-icon
+         />
+         
+         <div v-if="!validationResult.valid && validationResult.suggestion" class="suggestion">
+           <p>å»ºè®®è·¯å¾„ï¼š</p>
+           <el-input
+             :model-value="validationResult.suggestion"
+             readonly
+           >
+             <template #append>
+               <el-button @click="useSuggestion">ä½¿ç”¨å»ºè®®</el-button>
+             </template>
+           </el-input>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+     
+     <template #footer>
+       <span class="dialog-footer">
+         <el-button @click="handleClose">å–æ¶ˆ</el-button>
+         <el-button type="primary" @click="handleConfirm" :loading="loading">
+           ç¡®è®¤
+         </el-button>
+       </span>
+     </template>
+   </el-dialog>
+ </template>
+ 
+ <script setup lang="ts">
+ import { ref, computed, watch } from 'vue'
+ import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
+ import type { PathValidationResult } from '@/types'
+ 
+ interface Props {
+   modelValue: boolean
+   currentPath?: string
+ }
+ 
+ interface Emits {
+   (e: 'update:modelValue', value: boolean): void
+   (e: 'confirm', path: string): void
+ }
+ 
+ const props = defineProps<Props>()
+ const emit = defineEmits<Emits>()
+ 
+ const pathInput = ref('')
+ const loading = ref(false)
+ const validationResult = ref<PathValidationResult | null>(null)
+ 
+ const visible = computed({
+   get: () => props.modelValue,
+   set: (value) => emit('update:modelValue', value)
+ })
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬å¯¹è¯æ¡†æ‰“å¼€ï¼Œé¢„å¡«å……å½“å‰è·¯å¾„
+ watch(visible, (newVisible) => {
+   if (newVisible && props.currentPath) {
+     pathInput.value = props.currentPath
+   }
+ })
+ 
+ // ç›‘å¬è·¯å¾„è¾“å…¥å˜åŒ–ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå®æ—¶éªŒè¯
+ watch(pathInput, async (newPath) => {
+   if (newPath.trim()) {
+     await validatePath(newPath)
+   } else {
+     validationResult.value = null
+   }
+ }, { debounce: 500 })
+ 
+ const validatePath = async (path: string) => {
+   try {
+     // åŸºæœ¬è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯
+     const pathRegex = /^[a-zA-Z]:\\(?:[^\\/:*?"<>|\r\n]+\\)*[^\\/:*?"<>|\r\n]*$|^\/(?:[^\/\0]+\/)*[^\/\0]*$/
+     
+     if (!pathRegex.test(path)) {
+       validationResult.value = {
+         valid: false,
+         message: 'è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼ä¸æ­£ç¡®ã€‚è¯·ä½¿ç”¨æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿè·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼ã€‚',
+         suggestion: getPathSuggestion(path)
+       }
+       return
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„é•¿åº¦
+     if (path.length > 260) {
+       validationResult.value = {
+         valid: false,
+         message: 'è·¯å¾„é•¿åº¦è¶…è¿‡ç³»ç»Ÿé™åˆ¶ï¼ˆ260å­—ç¬¦ï¼‰ã€‚'
+       }
+       return
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«æ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦
+     let pathToCheck = path
+     if (path.match(/^[a-zA-Z]:\\/)) {
+       pathToCheck = path.substring(3) // ç§»é™¤ "D:\" éƒ¨åˆ†
+     }
+     
+     const invalidChars = /[<>"|?*]/
+     if (invalidChars.test(pathToCheck)) {
+       validationResult.value = {
+         valid: false,
+         message: 'è·¯å¾„åŒ…å«æ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦ï¼š< > " | ? *',
+         suggestion: getPathSuggestion(path)
+       }
+       return
+     }
+     
+     validationResult.value = {
+       valid: true,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡'
+     }
+   } catch (error) {
+     validationResult.value = {
+       valid: false,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼š' + (error as Error).message
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const getPathSuggestion = (path: string): string => {
+   // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯Windowsè·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼
+   const isWindowsPath = path.match(/^[a-zA-Z]:\\/)
+   let cleanPath = path
+   
+   if (isWindowsPath) {
+     // Windowsè·¯å¾„ï¼šä¿ç•™ç›˜ç¬¦ï¼Œåªæ¸…ç†è·¯å¾„éƒ¨åˆ†çš„æ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦
+     const drivePart = path.substring(0, 3) // "D:\"
+     const pathPart = path.substring(3)
+     cleanPath = drivePart + pathPart.replace(/[<>"|?*]/g, '')
+   } else {
+     // ç§»é™¤æ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦å¹¶è§„èŒƒåŒ–è·¯å¾„
+     cleanPath = path.replace(/[<>"|?*]/g, '')
+     
+     // è§„èŒƒåŒ–è·¯å¾„åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
+     cleanPath = cleanPath.replace(/\//g, '\\')
+     
+     // ç¡®ä¿è·¯å¾„ä»¥ç›˜ç¬¦å¼€å¤´ï¼ˆWindowsï¼‰
+     if (cleanPath && !cleanPath.match(/^[a-zA-Z]:\\/)) {
+       cleanPath = 'D:\\' + cleanPath
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return cleanPath
+ }
+ 
+ const useSuggestion = () => {
+   if (validationResult.value?.suggestion) {
+     pathInput.value = validationResult.value.suggestion
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ const handleClose = () => {
+   visible.value = false
+   pathInput.value = ''
+   validationResult.value = null
+ }
+ 
+ const handleConfirm = async () => {
+   const path = pathInput.value.trim()
+   
+   if (!path) {
+     ElMessage.warning('è¯·è¾“å…¥æœ‰æ•ˆçš„è·¯å¾„')
+     return
+   }
+   
+   // å¦‚æœè·¯å¾„éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯¢é—®ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦ç»§ç»­
+   if (validationResult.value && !validationResult.value.valid) {
+     // è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ç¡®è®¤å¯¹è¯æ¡†
+     // æš‚æ—¶ç›´æ¥å…è®¸ç»§ç»­
+   }
+   
+   loading.value = true
+   
+   try {
+     emit('confirm', path)
+     ElMessage.success('è·¯å¾„è®¾ç½®æˆåŠŸ')
+     handleClose()
+   } catch (error) {
+     ElMessage.error('è·¯å¾„è®¾ç½®å¤±è´¥')
+   } finally {
+     loading.value = false
+   }
+ }
+ </script>
+ 
+ <style scoped lang="scss">
+ .path-selector {
+   .path-hint {
+     margin: $spacing-md 0;
+     
+     .hint-content {
+       p {
+         margin: $spacing-xs 0;
+         font-size: $font-size-sm;
+         line-height: 1.4;
+       }
+     }
+   }
+   
+   .validation-result {
+     margin-top: $spacing-md;
+     
+     .suggestion {
+       margin-top: $spacing-md;
+       
+       p {
+         margin: 0 0 $spacing-sm 0;
+         font-weight: 500;
+         color: $text-primary;
+       }
+     }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ .dialog-footer {
+   display: flex;
+   justify-content: flex-end;
+   gap: $spacing-sm;
+ }
+ </style> 
```

```diff
+     await db.read()

+     
+     const updatedSubProject = {
+       ...db.data.sub_projects[subProjectIndex],
+       ...updates
+     }
+     
+     db.data.sub_projects[subProjectIndex] = updatedSubProject
+     await db.write()
+     
+     return updatedSubProject
+   }
+ 
+   async deleteSubProject(id: string): Promise<boolean> {
+     const db = this.ensureConnection()
+     await db.read()
+     
+     const initialLength = db.data.sub_projects.length
+     db.data.sub_projects = db.data.sub_projects.filter(sp => sp.id !== id)
+     
+     if (db.data.sub_projects.length < initialLength) {
+       await db.write()
+       return true
+     }
+     
+     return false
    }
  }
```

```diff
+ export async function validatePath(req: Request, res: Response) {
+   try {
+     const { path: dirPath } = req.body
+     
+     if (!dirPath) {
+       return res.status(400).json({
+         success: false,

+       })
+     }
+     
+     // éªŒè¯è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼
+     const pathValidation = validatePathFormat(dirPath)
+     if (!pathValidation.isValid) {
+       return res.status(400).json({
+         success: false,
+         message: pathValidation.message,
+         suggestions: pathValidation.suggestions
+       })
+     }
+     
+     // æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
+     const exists = await fs.pathExists(dirPath)
+     
+     res.json({
+       success: true,
+       data: {
+         path: dirPath,
+         exists,
+         isValid: true,
+         message: exists ? 'è·¯å¾„æœ‰æ•ˆä¸”å­˜åœ¨' : 'è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼æœ‰æ•ˆä½†ä¸å­˜åœ¨'
+       }
+     })
+   } catch (error) {
+     res.status(500).json({
+       success: false,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥',
+       error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'æœªçŸ¥é”™è¯¯'
+     })
+   }

+ // è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼éªŒè¯è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•°
+ function validatePathFormat(dirPath: string): { isValid: boolean; message: string; suggestions?: string[] } {
+   // æ£€æŸ¥è·¯å¾„é•¿åº¦
+   if (dirPath.length < 3) {
+     return {
+       isValid: false,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„å¤ªçŸ­ï¼Œè‡³å°‘éœ€è¦3ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦',
+       suggestions: ['ä¾‹å¦‚: C:\\', 'D:\\Projects']
+     }
+   }
+   
+   if (dirPath.length > 260) {
+     return {
+       isValid: false,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„å¤ªé•¿ï¼ŒWindowsç³»ç»Ÿé™åˆ¶ä¸º260ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦',
+       suggestions: ['è¯·ä½¿ç”¨è¾ƒçŸ­çš„è·¯å¾„å']
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥Windowsæ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦ï¼ˆæ’é™¤åˆæ³•çš„å†’å·ç”¨äºç›˜ç¬¦ï¼‰
+   const invalidChars = /[<>"|*?]/
+   if (invalidChars.test(dirPath)) {
+     return {
+       isValid: false,
+       message: 'è·¯å¾„åŒ…å«æ— æ•ˆå­—ç¬¦',
+       suggestions: ['é¿å…ä½¿ç”¨ < > " | * ? ç­‰ç‰¹æ®Šå­—ç¬¦']
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æ£€æŸ¥Windowsè·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼
+   const windowsPathPattern = /^[A-Za-z]:\\(.*)?$/
+   if (!windowsPathPattern.test(dirPath)) {
+     return {
+       isValid: false,
+       message: 'è¯·ä½¿ç”¨æ­£ç¡®çš„Windowsè·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼',
+       suggestions: ['ä¾‹å¦‚: C:\\Projects', 'D:\\AI-Projects\\MyProject']
+     }
+   }
+   
+   return {
+     isValid: true,
+     message: 'è·¯å¾„æ ¼å¼æœ‰æ•ˆ'
+   }
+ }
```

```diff
- 
+ import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express'
+ 
+ // éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™ç±»å‹
+ type ValidationSchema = {
+   [key: string]: {
+     required?: boolean
+     type?: 'string' | 'number' | 'boolean' | 'array' | 'object'
+     minLength?: number
+     maxLength?: number
+     pattern?: RegExp
+     enum?: any[]
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // éªŒè¯æ¨¡å¼å®šä¹‰
+ const validationSchemas: { [key: string]: ValidationSchema } = {
+   createProject: {
+     name: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 100 },
+     title: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 200 },
+     tag: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 50 },
+     description: { type: 'string', maxLength: 1000 },
+     status: { type: 'string', enum: ['è¿›è¡Œä¸­', 'å·²å®Œæˆ', 'å·²æš‚åœ'] },
+     directory_path: { type: 'string', maxLength: 260 },
+     directory_name: { type: 'string', maxLength: 100 },
+     is_calibrated: { type: 'boolean' }
+   },
+   
+   updateProject: {
+     name: { type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 100 },
+     title: { type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 200 },
+     tag: { type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 50 },
+     description: { type: 'string', maxLength: 1000 },
+     status: { type: 'string', enum: ['è¿›è¡Œä¸­', 'å·²å®Œæˆ', 'å·²æš‚åœ'] },
+     directory_path: { type: 'string', maxLength: 260 },
+     directory_name: { type: 'string', maxLength: 100 },
+     is_calibrated: { type: 'boolean' }
+   },
+   
+   createSubProject: {
+     name: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 100 },
+     parent_id: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 1 },
+     description: { type: 'string', maxLength: 1000 },
+     status: { type: 'string', enum: ['è¿›è¡Œä¸­', 'å·²å®Œæˆ', 'å·²æš‚åœ'] },
+     path: { type: 'string', maxLength: 260 }
+   },
+   
+   validatePath: {
+     path: { required: true, type: 'string', minLength: 3, maxLength: 260 }
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // éªŒè¯å•ä¸ªå­—æ®µçš„å‡½æ•°
+ function validateField(value: any, fieldName: string, rules: ValidationSchema[string]): string | null {
+   // æ£€æŸ¥å¿…å¡«å­—æ®µ
+   if (rules.required && (value === undefined || value === null || value === '')) {
+     return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} ä¸ºå¿…å¡«é¡¹`
+   }
+   
+   // å¦‚æœå­—æ®µä¸ºç©ºä¸”éå¿…å¡«ï¼Œè·³è¿‡å…¶ä»–éªŒè¯
+   if (!rules.required && (value === undefined || value === null || value === '')) {
+     return null
+   }
+   
+   // ç±»å‹éªŒè¯
+   if (rules.type) {
+     const actualType = Array.isArray(value) ? 'array' : typeof value
+     if (actualType !== rules.type) {
+       return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯ï¼ŒæœŸæœ› ${rules.type}ï¼Œå®é™… ${actualType}`
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç‰¹æ®ŠéªŒè¯
+   if (rules.type === 'string' && typeof value === 'string') {
+     if (rules.minLength !== undefined && value.length < rules.minLength) {
+       return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} é•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½å°‘äº ${rules.minLength} ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦`
+     }
+     
+     if (rules.maxLength !== undefined && value.length > rules.maxLength) {
+       return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} é•¿åº¦ä¸èƒ½è¶…è¿‡ ${rules.maxLength} ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦`
+     }
+     
+     if (rules.pattern && !rules.pattern.test(value)) {
+       return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} æ ¼å¼ä¸æ­£ç¡®`
+     }
+   }
+   
+   // æšä¸¾å€¼éªŒè¯
+   if (rules.enum && !rules.enum.includes(value)) {
+     return `å­—æ®µ ${fieldName} å€¼å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä»¥ä¸‹ä¹‹ä¸€: ${rules.enum.join(', ')}`
+   }
+   
+   return null
+ }
+ 
+ // éªŒè¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶å·¥å‚å‡½æ•°
+ export function validateRequest(schemaName: string) {
+   return (req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) => {
+     const schema = validationSchemas[schemaName]
+     
+     if (!schema) {
+       return res.status(500).json({
+         success: false,
+         message: `æœªçŸ¥çš„éªŒè¯æ¨¡å¼: ${schemaName}`
+       })
+     }
+     
+     const errors: string[] = []
+     const data = req.body
+     
+     // éªŒè¯æ¯ä¸ªå­—æ®µ
+     for (const [fieldName, rules] of Object.entries(schema)) {
+       const error = validateField(data[fieldName], fieldName, rules)
+       if (error) {
+         errors.push(error)
+       }
+     }
+     
+     // å¦‚æœæœ‰éªŒè¯é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¿”å›é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯
+     if (errors.length > 0) {
+       return res.status(400).json({
+         success: false,
+         message: 'è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥',
+         errors
+       })
+     }
+     
+     // éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡ï¼Œç»§ç»­å¤„ç†
+     next()
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // è‡ªå®šä¹‰éªŒè¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+ export function customValidation(validationFn: (data: any) => string | null) {
+   return (req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction) => {
+     const error = validationFn(req.body)
+     
+     if (error) {
+       return res.status(400).json({
+         success: false,
+         message: error
+       })
+     }
+     
+     next()
+   }
+ } 
```
